Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Requires introducer's memorandum to include a statement of fiscal impact affecting political subdivisions
Summary: Requires introducer's memorandum to include a statement of fiscal impact affecting political subdivisions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to requiring introducer's memorandum to include a statement of fiscal impact affecting political subdivisions
